text: Heliconia × flabellata is a species of plant in the family Heliconiaceae.José E. Abalo & Gustavo Morales L. 1983. Phytologia 52(6): 398–399, f. sn., Heliconia flabellata It is endemic to Ecuador.http Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families, Heliconia x flabellata Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forest. It is apparently a hybrid, H. episcopalis × H. rostrata. ==References== Category:Flora of Ecuador flabellata Category:Data deficient plants Category:Hybrid plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Heliconia × flabellata
